hero.name: Yonca İŞYAR
hero.description: I'm Yonca Isyar, 24 years old. I'm a senior student at Çukurova University, Faculty of Fine Arts, Department of Graphic Design (one course left). I value following innovations in design, constantly improving myself, and being open to learning with different perspectives. As a designer open to new experiences, I aim to take an active role in creative processes and add something to myself in every project.

arboris.title: Arboris
arboris.subtitle: National Furniture Company
arboris.description: The emblem of the Arboris logo is a unique design that combines a fingerprint with tree roots. Fingerprint: Represents the brand's uniqueness and goal of leaving a mark in every field. Tree Roots: Reflects the brand's deep-rooted structure and sustainability approach. This powerful symbol visually expresses both the brand's uniqueness and its deep-rooted, solid stance.

selcuk.title: Selçuk Pharmacy Warehouse
selcuk.subtitle: Corporate Identity
selcuk.description: This logo redesigned for "Selçuk Pharmacy Warehouse" reflects the trust and authority of the health sector in a modern language. The design places the universal symbol of pharmacy, the staff with a snake wrapped around it, within a geometric star form reminiscent of traditional Seljuk motifs. This minimal and meaningful design combines the institution's deep-rooted past with a modern service approach.

wush.title: Wush Wush Coffee
wush.subtitle: Coffee Shop
wush.description: This logo redesigned for Wush Wush Coffee Shop skillfully combines the shop's initial letter "W" with a coffee cup form. The fluid and wavy "W" form in the center, using dark brown and cream tones, functions not only as coffee steam but also as an abstract representation of the high-altitude mountainous areas where Wush Wush coffee grows.

dior.title: DIOR
dior.subtitle: Eyewear Collection
dior.description: This poster campaign combines luxury and an achievable dream with the slogan "PARIS IS SO CLOSE" to promote Dior's new eyewear collection. The campaign positions the glasses not just as a fashion accessory, but as a portal that brings the elegance, charm, and style of Paris within sight. The mysterious and captivating model image emphasizes the confidence and sophistication behind Dior glasses; used across various media from large-scale billboards to shopping mall panels, it invites the target audience to the heart of global fashion.

yetenek-sinavi.title: Talent Exam
yetenek-sinavi.subtitle: Conservatory
yetenek-sinavi.description: This poster prepared for the conservatory's 2025 talent exam combines the theme of classical art and music with elegant typography and an illustrative violin figure. An artistic atmosphere is created with aesthetic lines and musical note visuals.

arboris-afis.title: ARBORIS
arboris-afis.subtitle: Campaign Poster
arboris-afis.description: This advertising poster designed specifically for ARBORIS company presents the "30% Discount on All Single Seats" campaign with a simple and classic composition. Soft tones, natural texture feel, and an elegant font choice emphasize the brand's warm and trustworthy image.

bilgilendirme-yarisma.title: Information and Competition
bilgilendirme-yarisma.subtitle: Water Scarcity Awareness
bilgilendirme-yarisma.description: This poster designed to draw attention to water scarcity adopts a minimal approach. With a blue background and a simple iconographic watermelon slice symbol, the message "life cannot exist without water" is conveyed in a simple yet powerful way. The design was prepared within the scope of a competition aimed at creating environmental awareness.

selcuk-ecza-afis.title: Selçuk Pharmacy
selcuk-ecza-afis.subtitle: Billboard Design
selcuk-ecza-afis.description: In this billboard design I prepared for Selçuk Pharmacy Warehouse, I highlighted the brand's themes of trust and health. The slogan "Your Health is Guaranteed with Every Baggage" is supported by the baggage tag and medical bag composition in the visual, conveying the brand's reliable service approach with a strong visual message.

johnsons-baby.title: Johnsons Baby
johnsons-baby.subtitle: Baby Products
johnsons-baby.description: This packaging series designed for Johnsons Baby brand reflects the soft and trustworthy nature of baby products with cute penguin characters and a pastel color palette. Specially designed penguin characters for each product visually express the product's features while aiming to gain parents' trust.

kitap-tasarim.title: Book Design
kitap-tasarim.subtitle: Book Design
kitap-tasarim.description: This work is a completely original project I prepared for children's books, where I both wrote the story and personally designed all the illustrations for every page. The story focuses on a sailor and a little girl's delightful fishing adventure by the sea; I aimed to visualize the spirit of the text with my vibrant and cheerful drawings. It is a holistic work where text and visuals are in harmony.
